scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p src && npm run .copy-dist
scripts.test: rimraf spec/built && tsc -p spec && istanbul cover node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js -x "**/*.spec.js"
scripts..copy-dist: cpx package.json dist/ && cpx LICENSE dist/ && cpx README.md dist/
scripts..remapcov: cat coverage/coverage.json | ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul > coverage/coverage-remap.json && mv -f coverage/coverage-remap.json coverage/coverage.json
scripts..remapcov:win: type coverage\coverage.json | .\node_modules\.bin\remap-istanbul > coverage\coverage-remap.json && del coverage\coverage.json && ren coverage\coverage-remap.json coverage.json
